    A controller for managing book-related operations in the library application.

    A controller for desplaying the details of a book to the admin and allowing him to edit them.

    A controller for displaying the details of a user in the library application and allowing the admin to edit them.

    A controller for the user to manage his loans in the library application.

    A controller serving as the admin dashboard.

    A controller for managing the users of the system.
